mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "On Your Mark", "Hall of Fame", "National Convention", "The View From Here", "Rap with a Rep", "What is a Basic?", "Square Yore Sets", "How to Identify a Dancer", "Interesting Square Dancers", "Campers", "Help our Youth" and "Illustrated Basic Handbook." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Advanced Dancing", "Contra Corner", "Take a Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Experimental Notes", "Ladies on the Square", "On The Record", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Ammunition", "Caller of the Month", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
